title: parama purushha nirupamana
sahitya:
parama puruSa nirupamAna sharaNu sharaNu rE yEyEyEyE indirA
nijamandirA 
(parama)

anupallavi

kamalanAbha kamala nayana kamala charaNu rE
amita suramuni nAdhyUdhapa nAyakA varadAyakA 
(parama)

caraNam

catura mUriti catura bahu shankha cakrAdharA
atishaya shrI venkaTAdhipa anjanAkrti ranjanA 
(parama)
